name: Dungeon Query
description:
Dungeon Quizt is a high-score-based game where you try to clear as many rounds as possible. To higher the stakes, a ghost is chasing you and if you answer something wrong it will get angry!

CONTRIBUTE: If you discovered a bug, felt like something was missing, or would like to see your question added to the game you can do that by filling this anonymous google form: https://forms.gle/vxAt5Nv2U31MssoT6
